Action.author: scottz
Action.body: ~jyellick Is it sufficient (equivalent) to do this without doing the v1_1 capabilities updates for the orderers and peers? If so, then we ~Nishi can put these changes into https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric-test/blob/master/feature-upgrade/features/upgrade-abort.feature instead of the upgrade.feature file which does the full upgrade.
